content:
Is a frame in the correct format but with [[orderSize]] = 0 considered valid or invalid? ([[frameLength]] = 12.) The second constraint might effectively become a rule, and consider adding a pair of cases with such a frame if appropriate.

You might also want to reorder the cases, e.g. Corrupted (Test 14) and Validator 14 should probably appear much earlier.

Thanks.
Converted a previous clash into a puzzle (accidentally deleted the clash link). Feel free to provide feedback!

I would consider a frame with orderSize = 0 to be valid. However, I have specifically crafted each valid frame to have orderSize > 0 to avoid having no output.

I've also reordered the test cases accordingly, thank you!
